TopicTitle: Who else loves seeing the little "Notifications" tab lit up?

Articles.Content:
I like it a lot. It means Sampa replied to me Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Most of the time

Ditto, Xannari!

I woke up to my delight seeing this.

- - - Updated - - -

I used to be happy when it lit up.

Not anymore.

http://i.imgur.com/aU6vBCm.png

(get it? incoming? Ã¢â‚¬â€¹oh shut up)

By the way, I woke up yesterday and had 3 notifications.

Why are friend requests bad? In my friends list, I think only 3 came to me.. (It rhymes! )

Why are friend requests bad? In my friends list, I think only 3 came to me.. (It rhymes! )

I was making fun of the use of the word "incoming".

Sometimes...when I post a new comic...I let the mouse hover over 'notifications' for a while so it's lit up and then I can stop refreshing every 15 seconds to see if anyone likes the page. #confessyourforumsins
Got a nice surprise today, 6 notifications. And no infractions!

And no infractions!

I can help with that if you'd like.

(Kidding, <3 MRS)
I got 2 today, 2 yesterday, and a few the days before. I am happy to be back, and it seems like people are happy to have me back!

I can help with that if you'd like.

(Kidding, <3 MRS)

Anything for more notifications!!!! *Insane face*

Ever since xannari came into my life, i have had toclean out my sent mail and inbox daily!

(Don't worry, xan, i don't mind doing it at all)
Been getting quite a bit of notifications, especially a week ago, and all of them positive, so I always love it!
Whenever I recieve notifications, I'm slightly skeptical to click on it for fear of an infraction.. I often get a huge relief when it's rep comments.
And now I got four more. Still no infractions!

And now I got four more. Still no infractions!

You get that much on a daily basis? Lucky you

You get that much on a daily basis? Lucky you

Not every day, just because of spacecraft Fridays.

I have never gotten an infraction. Wheee!

So I don't have to worry about checking my notifications tab.
Well, i,woke up at 1:00pm yesterday to a,record number of notifications (for me, anyway). I had 5 notifications waiting! I,feel so popular!
You know what else I like? When someone gives me exactly enough rep to make the total a full multiple of 5.

You know what else I like? When someone gives me exactly enough rep to make the total a full multiple of 5.

I'm at 1319 and feeling kind of insane. Your post count is 994, by the way. Came to 3 notifications today!

Yeah, having the notification bar light up is such a nice feeling, though it seems to happen fairly rarely for me unless I'm having a conversation with someone through PMs...

It's pretty much the same thing with the little bell on the upper right corner of YouTube. I'm happy when that thing lights up, then usually sad or disappointed when I read the comment.

Also, how much rep do I need to get to 2 green bars?

Edited August 18, 2015 by Noname117
Geez, lately it's been at least one notification every time I log on to the forum. Four rep comments yesterday, three the day before, a load of private messages...

"No Comment Made"

Feels bad, man.

At least you're getting rep. Been here since 2012 and I've only got 120-some rep. Releasing 16 new aircraft, all with ejection seats and much improved aerodynamics, was only able to net me 15 rep. What is the secret to getting rep then?
Or course, I like seeing it lit up (everyone likes rep, I guess), but I'd enjoy if it would light up for something else than rep or PMs (subscribed threads for example )

At least you're getting rep. Been here since 2012 and I've only got 120-some rep. Releasing 16 new aircraft, all with ejection seats and much improved aerodynamics, was only able to net me 15 rep. What is the secret to getting rep then?

Personal engagement, and diversity. You've also made fewer than 250 posts in that time, after all No single post or thread is going to let you sit back and bask in the glow of the Notifications tab indefinitely.

On diversity--if you think about it, your "rep pool" is limited to fit a pretty narrow intersection: [your potential reppers]=[forum users]x[found your thread]x[are interested in 4th gen fighters]x[think your craft are good ones]x[actually remember to give rep to posts they like] That last one can be an especially tight filter sometimes, depending on what area of the Forum you're in.

I think a better metric for a builder like yourself to track would be the number of times each of your craft were downloaded. That's what tells you who is really using your stuff, and IMO is a much better measure of how good your "product" is than fake Internet points.

What do you guys do to get infractions? I've only ever gotten exactly one infraction on a forum in my life, and it wasn't on this one. They didn't really enjoy my sarcasm

I pretty much never posted again there. Take that!

I have found that if I speak my mind about certain topics posted here, I usually offend someone and as a result, get the infraction notice...

Heck, those with thin skin here would hate any of the classes I teach in college. Want to learn who you really are? Then learn what offends you or causes you to get out of your comfort zone...

Sorry if that seemed a bit snippy - I assure you that it was not meant to be that sharp of a comment.
